article.title: Lex Products to Support Mobile Electric Power System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lex Products Corporation, Shelton, Connecticut, is being awarded an approximate $8 million call number under a blanket purchase agreement for the procurement of Mobile Electric Power Distribution System replacement components in support of the Program Manager, Expeditionary Power Systems.Â The Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
